title: Problem 2
content:
(20 points)

Here are some words and word combinations in Abui and their English translations in arbitrary order:

| Abui                    | Translation                           |
|-------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| 1. abang                |                                       |
| 2. atáng heya           |                                       |
| 3. bataa hawata         |                                       |
| 4. dekafi               |                                       |
| 5. ebataa hatáng        |                                       |
| 6. ekuda hawata         |                                       |
| 7. falepak hawei        |                                       |
| 8. hatáng hamin         |                                       |
| 9. helui                |                                       |
| 10. maama hefalepak     |                                       |
| 11. napong              |                                       |
| 12. rièng               |                                       |
| 13. ritama              |                                       |
| 14. riya hatáng         |                                       |
| 15. tama habang         |                                       |
| 16. tamin               |                                       |
| 17. tefe hawei          |                                       |

| Translation                           | Abui                    |
|---------------------------------------|-------------------------|
| a. his fingertip                      |                         |
| b. your (sg.) branch                  |                         |
| c. my face                            |                         |
| d. one’s own rope                     |                         || e. your (sg.) shoulder                |                         |
| f. your (pl.) mother’s hand           |                         |
| g. our pigs’ ears (the ear of the pig of each of us) |         |
| h. father’s pistol                    |                         |
| i. your (sg.) horse’s neck            |                         |
| j. trigger                            |                         |
| k. your (pl.) eyes                    |                         |
| l. our noses (the nose of each of us) |                         |
| m. his knife                          |                         |
| n. seashore                           |                         || o. upper part of a tree               |                         |
| p. your (sg.) thumb                   |                         || q. your (pl.) sea                     |                         |

(a) Determine the correct correspondences.

(b) Translate into English: 
1. amin
2. deya hebataa.

(c) Translate into Abui:

1. pig  
2. your (pl.) knife  
3. your (sg.) mother’s father  
4. my father’s face  
5. one’s own ear  
6. my sea
